# Epoch Accumulator Test Vectors

This document contains test vectors Epoch Accumulator for the Header Network to help implementations conform to the specification.

## Header Accumulator Encodings

These test vectors specify the proper encoding of the header accumulator in certain well defined scenarios

### Epoch 0 Accumulator

#### Accumulator after genesis block

This test vector represents the input parameters and the expected output for the header accumulator after adding
the genesis block from Ethereum Mainnet.

##### Input Parameters
```
genesis header rlp = 
```
##### Expected Output
```
accumulator hash root = 0xb629833240bb2f5eabfb5245be63d730ca4ed30d6a418340ca476e7c1f1d98c0
```

#### Current Epoch Accumulator after Block 1
This test vector represents the input parameters and the expected output for the header accumulator after adding
block 1 from Ethereum Mainnet.

##### Input Parameters
```
block 1 header rlp = 
```
##### Expected Output
```
accumulator hash root = 0x00cbebed829e1babb93f2300bebe7905a98cb86993c7fc09bb5b04626fd91ae5
```

#### Current Epoch Accumulator after Block 2
This test vector represents the input parameters and the expected output for the header accumulator after adding
block 2 from Ethereum Mainnet.

#### Input Parameters
```
block 2 header rlp = 
```
#### Expected Output
```
accumulator hash root = 0x88cce8439ebc0c1d007177ffb6831c15c07b4361984cc52235b6fd728434f0c7
```
